SELECT r.orderNum, m1.userId, userName, tel, email, TO_CHAR(start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD')start_date, TO_CHAR(end_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD')end_date, carName, payment, TO_CHAR(m2.birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD')birth, TO_CHAR(licenseDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')licenseDate, addRider, TO_CHAR(addBirth, 'YYYY-MM-DD')addBirth, TO_CHAR(addRegist, 'YYYY-MM-DD')addRegist, addRiderName, licenseImage, addLicenseImage, addRiderTel FROM carReservation r JOIN member1 m1 ON r.memberIdx = m1.memberIdx JOIN addLicense a ON r.orderNum = a.orderNum JOIN campingCar c ON r.carNum = c.carNum JOIN member2 m2 ON m1.userId = m2.userId JOIN license l ON m1.memberIdx = l.memberIdx WHERE r.orderNum = #{orderNum}
